title: INTENSE MEDIEVAL SIEGE - Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Gameplay
description:
Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Gameplay - The French march a huge army to lay waste to a small Pomeranian fortress. The Duchy of Pomerania has called upon their ally the Teutonic Order to help defend their home.  Who will be victorious in the conclusion of this bloody conflict?  Enjoy the Battle :D

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
